resources.string: Click on the cover\nto add it to your collection
The picture is too big, please try again.
No cover matches your photo, please try again.
Displaying the bookcase view when on a mobile network can lead to a high data consumption. Do you still want to display it?
Cannot create upload file from bitmap
You cannot modify at the same time issues that you own several copies of and issues that you have a single copy of
Loading your DucksManager account failed, check that your Internet connection is active. You will be able to browse through your collection while offline once your collection is synchronized.
Could not create empty file for the camera
You have already rated this author!
You need to enter your credentials to continue
The encryption of your credentials failed
Adding the issue in your collection failed
The list is malformed, please try again later
The creation of the purchase date failed
You already have this issue in your collection
The list has been copied to your clipboard.
Select an issue by tapping on it.\nSelect a range of issues by long-tapping on the first item of the range.
What The Duck is the mobile app of DucksManager. Click here to access the DucksManager website.
Long-tap on the last issue of your range
You can specify a maximum of 3 copies for each issue
You have reached the maximum number of authors to rate. Remove already watched authors if you want to rate a new one.
Network issue: please check your Internet connection
New features in the WhatTheDuck app
You can now add multiple copies of the same issue in your collection!
A new version of What The Duck is available !\nClick here to update the app
You don\'t have any favorite authors
No issue in this list. Click on the "+" icon to add issues to your collection!
We don\'t have any suggestion for you. Make sure that you rated your favorite authors.\nThe suggestions are updated daily.
Notify me when new stories from my favorite authors come out
You are using offline mode. You can browse through your collection but not update it. Some features will not be available.
What The Duck couldn\'t retrieve your collection. Are you connected to the Internet?
This view is not available in offline mode. Click here to go back to the collection view
Suggest me issues released in the following countries:
Remember to rate What The Duck on the Play Store :-)
Add your favorite authors and rate them according to your preferences.\nThanks to these ratings, What The Duck can suggest you issues to hunt for.\nThese suggestions are updated daily.
Is something not working in the app? Explain your issue and we will try to fix it in the next version :-)

If the typed e-mail address corresponds to a DucksManager account, we just sent a link to this address allowing you to reset your password. If the e-mail does not reach you within a few minutes, please check your Spam folder.
Fill in your e-mail address to reset your password.
Set conditions on all existing copies before adding a new one
You have signed up to DucksManager successfully, please login.

WhatTheDuck provides you with a personalized list of issues containing new stories from your favorite authors.\nYou can change what countries to show in the Settings screen and what authors to show in the My favorite authors screen.\nThe suggestions are updated daily.
Welcome to the bookcase view! Rotate your screen to landscape for the best effect ;-)
Your DucksManager collection is displayed when you open What The Duck. Tap on a country to view the publications that you possess, or tap on \"+\" to add an issue to your collection.
